objects.text:
• Premium Dual-Color Leather
• Spacious Interior
• Exterior Slip Pockets
• Durable Gold Hardware

product_details.name: Elegant Two-Tone Designer Hobo Bag - Black & Brown Leather Shoulder Tote with Exterior Pockets
product_details.description:
• Premium dual-color leather design combining classic black and rich brown
• Spacious main compartment with generous interior storage
• Convenient exterior slip pockets on both sides for easy access
• Durable gold-tone hardware and sturdy shoulder strap
• High-quality stitching and professional craftsmanship
• Modern minimalist aesthetic perfect for work and casual use
• Versatile size suitable for daily essentials
• Sleek, contemporary color-block design
• Easy-access open top design
• Smooth leather finish with elegant sheen
• Professional look ideal for office and business settings
• Lightweight yet sturdy construction for everyday use

banner_details:
The banner features a stylish promotional layout for a fashion product. It is split diagonally into two background segments: a deep chocolate brown gradient on the upper right and a muted beige gradient on the lower left, creating contrast and balance. A high-quality image of a two-tone leather hobo bag is placed on the right, partially overlapping the diagonal divider. 

Bold, uppercase text elements (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) are placed at the top left, drawing attention with white font. The subheading (`subheading`) in gold color emphasizes the luxury theme. Below, the feature details (`description`) are listed using bullet points in white. The price (`price`) is prominently highlighted in large golden text, followed by a rectangular CTA button (`cta_button`) with a dark brown text label (`cta`) reading “SHOP NOW”. Subtle decorative lines and dotted patterns add texture and depth to the background.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Brown: #36221E
- Chocolate: #4A2F27
- Beige: #D1BCA3, #C4AD93
- Gold: #D4AF37
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, dual-tone modern handbag that blends deep black (#1A1A1A) and rich chocolate brown (#4B2E2E) tones with a touch of warm burgundy (#5D3A3A). The elegant color contrast between the left black panel and the right burgundy-brown panel creates a sophisticated visual split. The muted gold hardware (#D4AF37) adds a subtle shine, enhancing the overall luxury appeal. The blending is sharply defined by geometric stitching, yet harmonized through the soft leather texture and sheen. Recommended advertisement banner palette includes: black (#1A1A1A), cocoa brown (#4B2E2E), burgundy (#5D3A3A), soft beige (#D8C7B5), and gold (#D4AF37) for highlights and accents.
